name: Weeping Willow of the Lake
description:
End Phase: If your Hand has no more than 2 cards, draw 2 cards.
Usage(s): 2
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> If your Hand has no more than 2 cards, draw 2 cards.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> If your Hand has no more than 2 cards, draw 2 cards.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 2</color>
storytext: In ancient times, the weeping willow of the lake was an object of reverence. All the water veins converge upon Erinnyes and the weeping willow flourishes or withers when the waters are sweet or bitter.
